these are awsome looking. moe stuff like this is needed. only thing i see on them is have the pipe at top point backwards to connect to ship instead of off to side.

we realy do need more tanks like this. thats why i still use to old thss trusses cause they look awsome even thou the orage color is glaring. also why dont u make a truss set where tanks are inside of it. my dream is to make a awsome ship out of trusses with fuel and everything inside it.
Check out the independent octo truss set of Kommitz (which has a cool tank) or the new truss of NFPP

New version:

0.6

- New Part: Pressurized Resupply Tank. It holds the following resources: oxygen, carbondioxide, water, waste water, liquid fuel, oxidizer and monopropellant.

- Cleaned up folder structure.

- Fixed some the resource file

- Added new part descriptions to CTB - blackheart612

these are awsome looking. moe stuff like this is needed. only thing i see on them is have the pipe at top point backwards to connect to ship instead of off to side.

we realy do need more tanks like this. thats why i still use to old thss trusses cause they look awsome even thou the orage color is glaring. also why dont u make a truss set where tanks are inside of it. my dream is to make a awsome ship out of trusses with fuel and everything inside it.

Thanks!

The pipes are oriented so that it looks like they are connected to the part they are attached to.

Edited March 7, 2014 by Albert VDS

New version:

0.6

COOOOL! I love you man, no homo

This is really cool.

I would like to point out a small typo, though.

In the description for the tanks it states: "These tanks can be filled liquid and gas resources". It's missing a "with".

EDIT: I'm not too certain if this is a typo or not, but in the description for the bags it states: "Contains all the things you need to stay alive while dying."

I'm fairly sure that there's meant to be a "not" between "while" and "dying".

Edited March 7, 2014 by Sgt. Cookie

Thanks, I'll fix that.

The fuels need to have a believable amount too.... now it's all 250. I overlooked that. =X
Hmm, if you are having problems with it, maybe look at FASA's tank as big as these. Or maybe the smaller tanks such as the 0.625 tank.

Well, for the gasses, 250 looks about right. So, unless you have a part specifically for Oxygen and Co2 (Not that unreasonable, at least from a realism perspective), I'd suggest that you make them about equal to the FL-T100's, which is about 45 Liquid Fuel and 55 Oxidizer, so about 100 units in total.

They are a bit smaller, how about LF:36 O:44 and 80 mono?

New version is up.

0.6.1

- Fixed type in PRT .cfg file

Scratch the fix for lf, ox and mono. I have no clue how to get max amounts to work properly. =X

Anyone have a clue on how to fix it?

Hey blackheart612 is possible the new Pressurized resupply tanks with this textures?

I really like this mod, but the needing real fuels mod is killing it for me. I generally try to stay away from mods that require other mods, and unfortunately I think I'm going to have to abandon this unless a version come out that works without MFT

I really like this mod, but the needing real fuels mod is killing it for me. I generally try to stay away from mods that require other mods, and unfortunately I think I'm going to have to abandon this unless a version come out that works without MFT

Intentional Double Post:

It is an older version of the mod, but it would still have the core functionality.

edit: He is also just using the plugin from MFT. You could delete all of the configs and other stuff that come with MFT and therefore not have the effects of MFT on other tanks.

Edited March 7, 2014 by PringleMan

Hey blackheart612 is possible the new Pressurized resupply tanks with this textures?

Yep, if you can wait just a little as soon as I am able to do the texturing.

I really like this mod, but the needing real fuels mod is killing it for me. I generally try to stay away from mods that require other mods, and unfortunately I think I'm going to have to abandon this unless a version come out that works without MFT

It's newly released, I'm gonna make a no-MFT config again for this part. Tell Albert to make an alternate DL for it

So MFT is giving some problems, like the max amount of resources but also the max number of resources.

At the moment you can just fill the tanks with whatever number and amount of resources, while it should be 2 resources and a specific amount for each.

So I'm going to see if I can get the texture switcher to allow switching of resources and amount at the same time.

The plan is to remove MFT and create a resource switcher plugin based on FS texture switcher.

As to catch up with my previous textures, I made these.

Could have made a shot for each but Im lacking time as of now.

Let me know what you guys think I'll upload it as soon as I can.

Also Albert, I am amazed how compact your UV is.

It's compact, easy to texture and very unbelievable but also its texture is hard to find.

Another is for example, I need to texture the top part of PRT and whoa, the bottom is textured like that, too. I am quite amazed but also had the problem that I can't texture the part separate from the top.

BTW, may I ask why the texture are RPT-name-? Well.... they are.... Pressurized Resupply Tank. lol

love the tanks, like the decals, but the colors need to be bolder...imo.... There should be no doubt that when you grab for a tank of ****, squz me, liquid waste that it looks like bad kidney, liquid waste. And i think the waste needs to go back to good 'waste' brown.......
